mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO user_star (user_id, counselor_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{counselorId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_star WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND counselor_id = #{counselorId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_star WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND counselor_id = #{counselorId}

SELECT us.counselor_id as counselorId, c.name as name, c.head_url as headUrl, c.head_url_square as headUrlSquare, c.qualifications as qualifications, c.introduction as introduction, c.consult_type as consultType, c.consult_price as consultPrice, c.service_type as serviceType, c.directions as directions, c.consult as consult, c.experience_date as experienceDate, c.experience_time as experienceTime, c.city_name as cityName FROM user_star us LEFT JOIN counselor c ON us.counselor_id = c.id WHERE us.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY us.created_at DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) FROM counselor c
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT us.user_id as userId, COALESCE(u.phone, CONCAT('用户', us.user_id)) as userName, u.phone as phone, u.avatar as avatar, us.created_at as starTime FROM user_star us LEFT JOIN user u ON us.user_id = u.id WHERE us.counselor_id = #{counselorId} ORDER BY us.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
